summary: Molly, the eldest child at a baby farm hidden deep in a swamp, must rescue the others when their cruel master decides that one of them will be disposed of.
cast: Mary Pickford|Roy Stewart|Mary Louise Miller|Gustav von Seyffertitz|Charlotte Mineau|Spec O'Donnell|Lloyd Whitlock|Billy Butts|Monty O'Grady|Jackie Levine|Billy 'Red' Jones|Muriel McCormac|Florence Rogan|Mary McLain|Sylvia Bernard|Seessel Anne Johnson|Cammilla Johnson|Mark Hamilton|A.L. Schaeffer
title: Gorriones
